text:
The optional tasks section and the optional task description
in the Ant User Manual don't say how to provide external Jar 
files to Ant, and don't point the reader to the section that
does provide that information.

It would be helpful if the Optional Tasks link brought up a
list that started with an Overview link to an overview page
that referred the user to the relevant section of the 
Installing Ant page.
creator: dsb@smart.net
